title: MoreLikeThisHandler shows wrong explains output
description:
The MoreLikeThisHandler, when showing explains output, shows the scoring calculations based upon the rawMLTQuery, not the boostedMLTQuery, meaning that boosts aren't shown in the explains output.

Given that explains is supposed to "explain" the score that was actually used, this is clearly incorrect.

The fix is a one-liner. Patch to follow.
